articles.description: The “Queer as Folk” reboot has been canceled after one season at Peacock, Variety has learned. The entire first season of the show was released on the streamer on June 9. It originally received a straight-to-series order at Peacock in April 2021. The show fol…
articles.content:
The “Queer as Folk” reboot has been canceled after one season at Peacock, Variety has learned.

articles.author: Anna Betts
articles.title: "Riverdale" Actor Ryan Grantham Has Been Sentenced To Life In Prison For Killing His Mother - BuzzFeed News
articles.description: “I cannot explain or justify my actions. I have no excuse," Grantham said in June.
articles.content:
Grantham is not eligible to apply for parole until he has served 14 years behind bars. He is also banned for life from owning a firearm.
